rule: The output should consist of the input paragraph split into individual sentences.
input: Dr. Smith arrived early. He prepared for the lecture. Students awaited eagerly.
validityText:
The input provided is a paragraph of text consisting of three sentences: "Dr. Smith arrived early." "He prepared for the lecture." "Students awaited eagerly." According to the input specification, the input should be a paragraph of text containing at least three sentences. Upon evaluating the provided input, it does indeed consist of a paragraph that includes three sentences, meeting the requirement specified.

No violations of the input specification are present as the input complies directly with the requirements of being a paragraph with at least three sentences.

OK
